'''2.1.5069''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.5070''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.5071''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is a [[launcher]] beta version released on June 18, 2019, which updated translations and fixed bugs.<ref name="50xx"/>

== Changes ==
; Translations
* Updated translations.

== Fixes ==
;[https://bugs.mojang.com/issues/?jql=project+%3D+MCL+AND+fixVersion+%3D+2.1.5069-2.1.5071 9 bugs fixed]
* Fixed problems launching beta versions of Forge.<ref name="50xx">{{tweet|slicedlime|1141006123383869440}}</ref><ref name=":2">{{tweet|slicedlime|1141006124650569731}}</ref>
* Fixed patch note link leading to the incorrect page.
* Fixed taskbar icon and WM class on linux.
* Fixed crash report not showing up immediately if launcher was re-opened on game crash.
* Fixed unapproved languages not showing up in the beta launcher.<ref name=":2"/>
* {{Bug|MCL-10996}} – Some languages are not available in the launcher
* {{Bug|MCL-11027}} – Beta launcher: cannot launch 1.7.10
*{{Bug|MCL-11038}} – Dropdown arrow moves down when width is too small
* {{Bug|MCL-11039}} – When on the login screen, pressing tab after entering username selects "?" instead of password field
</onlyinclude>
